query:
SELECT 
            sw.is_active,
            sw.public_key,
            COUNT(ek.id) as key_count
        FROM system_wallets sw
        LEFT JOIN encrypted_keys ek ON ek.owner_id = sw.id AND ek.key_type = $1
        WHERE sw.wallet_type = $1
        GROUP BY sw.id, sw.is_active, sw.public_key
